name: NICE TIES ARE NICETIES.
description: What is the point of wearing a tie? It is purely a cosmetic and decorative accessory that serves absolutely no function other than a dash of color/design/texture/etc. The word "niceties" has a few varying definitions, but one of them is: A fine point, small detail, or subtle distinction. Now if we seperate the word niceties into two words, we get nice ties and then if we integrate these words into a simple sentence, we get: NICE TIES ARE NICETIES; a minimal sentence that is truth.
